metadata.name: Locked Starting Trinkets
metadata.description:
A mod that locks the starting trinkets of each character by smelting them.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2774145099]Locked Starting Items[/url]
[url=https://moddingofisaac.com/mod/3766/abrep-locked-starting-trinkets]Modding of Isaac[/url]
